CustomField.description: Marks ambiguous addresses as invalid, when the API returns more than one address. If left unselected, Salesforce will accept the first suggested address as the valid address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Marks ambiguous addresses as invalid, when the API returns more than one address. If left unselected, Salesforce will accept the first suggested address as the valid address.
CustomField.label: Reject Ambiguous Addresses-DEPRECATED
